=REQUIREMENTS ANALYSIS=

==1. General description==

   The application shall be a social web application to create an environment, where CMPE community can express and discover matters of interest – academic or otherwise.

   This place shall evolve into an archive of useful information. 

==2. Specific requirements==

===2.1. FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS===

*   2.1.1. Member profiles*

   2.1.1.1. Each member shall have their information fields such as: Name, Title(student, instructor, graduate…), Birthday, E-mail, Telephone, Gender, Interests, Connections, Education, Work etc, Graduation Year etc.

*   2.1.2. Home page*

   2.1.2.1. The user shall go to the home page after logging in.

   2.1.2.2. Latest discussions, current events, new posts to various interests should appear home page.

   2.1.2.3. The posts to interests that appear on the home page should be the ones followed by the specific user.

   2.1.2.4. There should be a vertical section where there are tabs such as inbox, connections, notifications, events, discussions, surveys, interests.


*   2.1.3. Creation of a space for special interests*
	2.1.3.1. Each member profile shall include a space for special interests specific to that person.

	_2.1.3.2. Space for special interests should include subsections._

	_2.1.3.3. At the launching stage these subsections should be limited to music, movies, books and others, in order to keep design simple and understandable by new users._

	2.1.3.4. Each member should be able to share information about their special interests via space for special interests. 

	2.1.3.5. System should support a specific format for each kind of special interests information given above. For example, when sharing musical interests, the specific format should include tags like artist, album, year, genre etc.

	2.1.3.6. Each member should be able to decide the level of publicity of his/her special interests information(i.e. his/her information can be viewed either by all people or by a specific group of people like followers).

*   2.1.4. Special purpose structures for the area of interest*

   2.1.4.1. The system shall list the related applications below each area of interest when clicked.

   2.1.4.2. Users should be able to view and use those applications.

   2.1.4.3. Users should be able to click and start the *My Playlists* app below the music section.

   2.1.4.4. Users should be able to add music playlists and share them by the *My Playlists* application.


*   2.1.5. Discussion forum*

   2.1.5.1. A member should be able to start a new discussion topic.

     * The member shall write a related topic about his/her post.

     * The member shall choose the related interests to specify the target audience.

     * The member shall post the content.

   2.1.5.2. A member should be able to reply.

*   2.1.6. Surveys*

   2.1.6.1. A member should be able to create a survey.

     * The member shall choose the related interests to specify the target audience.

     * The member shall specify the duration of the survey.

   2.1.6.2. The owner of the survey should specify whether and when the results of the survey are visible.

*   2.1.7. Subscription to areas of interests and forums*

   2.1.7.1. A member shall be able to subscribe to areas of interests.

   2.1.7.2. A member shall be able to subscribe to the topics in forums.

*   2.1.8. Search/Advanced search*

   2.1.8.1. A member shall search for a person, survey, interest, topic.

   2.1.8.2. A member shall filter the result of search by using advanced search.

*   2.1.9. Browsing*

   2.1.9.1. Users should be able to view the website's homepage.

   2.1.9.2. Users should be able to view the forums, surveys and discussions.

   2.1.9.3. Users should be able to view the other members' profiles if allowed.

   2.1.9.4. The system shall redirect the users when a link of a different website is clicked by them.

*   2.1.10. Notification from subscriptions*

   2.1.10.1. A member shall get the notifications for the newest posts about his/her subscribed interests.

  2.1.10.2. A member shall get the notifications for the newest comments about the topics he/she created.

  2.1.10.3. A member shall get the notifications for the result of the surveys he/she created.

*   2.1.11. Events*

  2.1.11.1. A member should be able to create an event.
	
  2.1.11.2. The creator of the event shall decide the information about the event like time,place,duration,other details.
	
  2.1.11.3. The creator of the event  shall decide the privacy level of the event like whether it will be secret or public and whether it will be invite-only or every guest will be able to invite other members. 

  2.1.11.4. The members of the event should be able to write on the event page,add links,upload photos or videos.

*   2.1.12. Settings*

  2.1.12.1. There shall be account and privacy settings sections.

*   2.1.13. Help*

  2.1.13.1. There should be a documentation about how to use the application.


===2.2 NON-FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS===

*   2.2.1. Operating & Platform constraints* 

  2.2.1.1. The application should be supported by all types of web browsers.

*   2.2.2. Modifiability *

  2.2.2.1. The system shall be designed so that the developers can modify it to respond the varying needs of users.

*   2.2.3. Portability*

  2.2.3.1. A mobile application to interact with community shall be supported.

*   2.2.4. Security *

  2.2.4.1. The application shall be accessed via a user authentification process. (i.e. sign in) Only members shall see the contents. Registration shall be validated since it is a restricted community.

*   2.2.5. Usability *

  2.2.5.1. The user interface of the application should be similar to popular social media applications (e.g. Facebook) at the launch stage to achieve ease of use.

*   2.2.6. Privacy*

  2.2.6.1. The user shall be able to arrange the visibility of their information, posts etc.

*   2.2.7. Language*

  2.2.7.1. In the early stage, the application shall be in English for everybody including foreigners to understand.
